layers.name: Foundation Infrastructure
layers.description: Core infrastructure setup - databases, caching, containerization

tasks.name: Database Setup
tasks.description: Set up PostgreSQL with schema, Qdrant vector DB, Redis cache
tasks.validation_criteria: All databases running, can connect and perform basic operations

tasks.name: Temporal.io Setup
tasks.description: Deploy Temporal.io server for workflow orchestration
tasks.validation_criteria: Temporal server running, can create and execute basic workflows

tasks.name: Docker Sandbox
tasks.description: Create Docker images for code execution sandboxes
tasks.validation_criteria: Can execute Python/Node.js code in isolated containers

tasks.name: Memory Manager
tasks.description: Implement unified memory interface (vector + relational + cache)
tasks.validation_criteria: Can store/retrieve memories with semantic search

tasks.name: Memory Migration
tasks.description: Migrate from memory.json to new memory system
tasks.validation_criteria: All existing memories preserved and searchable

tasks.name: Tool Framework
tasks.description: Design BaseTool class and tool registry system
tasks.validation_criteria: Can dynamically load and execute tools with validation

tasks.name: Core Tools
tasks.description: Build 5 essential tools: terminal, file, web_search, calculator, human_input
tasks.validation_criteria: All 5 tools working with safety guards and error handling

tasks.name: App Launcher Refactor
tasks.description: Replace LLM-generated commands with structured registry approach
tasks.validation_criteria: Can launch apps reliably without command generation

layers.validation_criteria: Can execute simple commands safely, store/retrieve memories

layers.name: Reasoning Engine

tasks.name: Task Decomposer
tasks.description: Build LangGraph-based task decomposition system
tasks.validation_criteria: Can break complex tasks into logical subtasks with dependencies

tasks.name: Roadmap Generator
tasks.description: Create DAG builder for execution plans
tasks.validation_criteria: Generates executable roadmaps with proper sequencing

tasks.name: Option Evaluator
tasks.description: Compare different approaches and select optimal path
tasks.validation_criteria: Can evaluate multiple solutions and justify selection

tasks.name: Anti-Hallucination System
tasks.description: Implement validation loops and logic checking
tasks.validation_criteria: Catches logical inconsistencies and prevents derailment

tasks.name: Track Keeper
tasks.description: Build system to prevent confusion on complex tasks
tasks.validation_criteria: Can detect when off-track and self-correct

tasks.name: Reasoning Integration
tasks.description: Connect reasoning engine to brain.py with state management
tasks.validation_criteria: Reasoning engine integrated with full observability

layers.validation_criteria: Can break down complex tasks into roadmaps, validate plan quality

layers.name: Execution Engine
layers.description: Tactical execution system with tool orchestration

tasks.name: Tool Orchestrator
tasks.description: Build routing logic and tool chaining system
tasks.validation_criteria: Can route tasks to appropriate tools and chain operations

tasks.name: Result Validation
tasks.description: Framework for validating tool execution results
tasks.validation_criteria: Can detect successful vs failed tool executions

tasks.name: Code Executor
tasks.description: Docker-based sandboxed code execution with limits
tasks.validation_criteria: Can execute code safely with resource limits and timeouts

tasks.name: Output Parser
tasks.description: Parse and structure outputs from different tools
tasks.validation_criteria: Can extract structured data from various output formats

tasks.name: Error Recovery
tasks.description: Implement retry logic and fallback strategies
tasks.validation_criteria: Can recover from failures and escalate appropriately

tasks.name: Human Escalation
tasks.description: Build system for escalating to human when automated recovery fails
tasks.validation_criteria: Can notify human and wait for input when needed

layers.validation_criteria: Can execute multi-tool workflows safely with recovery

layers.name: Workflow Engine
layers.description: Proactive system with long-running workflow support

tasks.name: Workflow Builder
tasks.description: Convert natural language to Temporal workflow DAGs
tasks.validation_criteria: Can create executable workflows from user descriptions

tasks.name: Checkpoint System
tasks.description: Save/restore state for long-running tasks
tasks.validation_criteria: Can pause/resume workflows across system restarts

tasks.name: Email Watcher
tasks.description: IMAP IDLE monitoring for email-triggered workflows
tasks.validation_criteria: Can detect new emails and trigger appropriate workflows

tasks.name: File System Monitor
tasks.description: Watch for file changes and trigger workflows
tasks.validation_criteria: Can detect file changes and execute configured actions

tasks.name: Event Bus
tasks.description: Redis-based pub/sub for inter-engine communication
tasks.validation_criteria: Engines can communicate asynchronously via events

tasks.name: Approval Gates
tasks.description: Human-in-loop approval system for critical operations
tasks.validation_criteria: Can pause workflows for human approval and resume

layers.validation_criteria: Can monitor email, execute multi-day workflows with checkpoints

layers.name: Skills Framework
layers.description: Advanced cognitive capabilities and domain expertise

tasks.name: Prompt Optimizer
tasks.description: Task-specific prompt templates and optimization
tasks.validation_criteria: Can generate optimized prompts for different task types

tasks.name: Architecture Designer
tasks.description: System for designing software architecture
tasks.validation_criteria: Can create proper software architecture plans

tasks.name: Code Generator
tasks.description: Generate code following best practices
tasks.validation_criteria: Generates clean, well-structured code

tasks.name: Task Management Skills
tasks.description: Advanced task decomposition and roadmap building
tasks.validation_criteria: Can handle complex multi-step projects

tasks.name: Outcome Analyzer
tasks.description: Analyze execution results and learn from outcomes
tasks.validation_criteria: Can identify patterns in success/failure and improve

layers.validation_criteria: Can build full-stack applications with proper architecture

layers.name: Intelligence Upgrades

tasks.name: Multi-Level Planning
tasks.description: Strategic, tactical, and operational planning layers
tasks.validation_criteria: Can plan at multiple abstraction levels

tasks.name: Adversarial Validation
tasks.description: Devil's advocate system for plan validation
tasks.validation_criteria: Can identify potential flaws in plans

tasks.name: Pattern Learning
tasks.description: Extract patterns from execution history
tasks.validation_criteria: Can learn from past experiences and apply lessons

tasks.name: Jarvis Personality
tasks.description: Implement Jarvis-like personality and proactive behavior
tasks.validation_criteria: Feels natural and proactive like Jarvis

layers.validation_criteria: Noticeably improves over time, feels like Jarvis

layers.name: Production Polish
layers.description: Performance optimization, monitoring, and production readiness

tasks.name: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Profile and optimize hot paths, implement caching
tasks.validation_criteria: Significant performance improvements measured

tasks.name: Monitoring Setup
tasks.description: Prometheus metrics, Grafana dashboards, alerting
tasks.validation_criteria: Full observability with alerts for issues

tasks.name: Test Suite
tasks.description: Comprehensive unit, integration, and e2e tests
tasks.validation_criteria: 80%+ test coverage, all critical paths tested

tasks.name: Documentation
tasks.description: API docs, architecture diagrams, user guides
tasks.validation_criteria: Complete documentation for users and developers
